name: Anitbug Squad
description:
As part of the Antibug Squadron, as a killing machine, you are tasked with taking care of and eliminating your targets. Bugs.

This application opens a window that shows the inside of your computer and how it deals with bugs.*

*Disclaimer: This isn't what actually happens

Controls:

     WASD/arrow keys to both move 

          and shoot

Assets:

MusicAntti LuodeFontDaniel Linssen

Made for Weekly Game Jam 64 - 'Glitch'
